alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Chilton; Perry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 6:33AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Chilton, northeastern Perry and southeastern Bibb Counties through 715 AM CDT... At 632 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Talladega National Forest, or 9 miles southeast of Centreville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clanton, Brent, Centreville, Jemison, Thorsby, Maplesville, Lawley, Gap Of The Mountain, West Centreville, Lay Lake Dam, Talladega National Forest, Chilton County Motor Sports Park, Verbena, Pooles Crossroads, Mitchell Lake, Lay Lake, Randolph, Lomax, Trio and I 65 Rest Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
